com.ui.table
Class ColumnModelBuilder

java.lang.Object
  com.ui.table.ColumnModelBuilder

public class ColumnModelBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

Builds a table column model, TableColumnModel, in which the model is based on one or more ColumnDefinition instances.

The table column model created by this builder is expected to used with DataGrid.

This class uses instances of ColumnDefinition, which represents information regarding a single colmun, to build TableColumn objects that typically comprises the TableColumnModel.

Author:
rterrell

          Creates a ColumnModelBuilder initialized with an empty table model and an empty column definition list.

Method Detail

addCol

public boolean addCol(ColumnDefinition def)
Creates a TableColumn instance and adds it to the table model using def and adds the def instance to the list of column definitions that is maintained by this class.

Parameters:
def - an instance of ColumnDefinition
Returns:
boolean true when def is converted to a TableColumn and added to the list column definitions successfully. Returns false when def itself or its properties, id or headerValue, are null.

removeCol

public boolean removeCol(java.lang.String propName)
Removes a column from the table column model.

Parameters:
propName - the name of the column assoicated with the table column model.
Returns:
boolean true when the column is removed and false otherwise.

getDefList

public java.util.List<ColumnDefinition> getDefList()
Return the List of column definitions.

Returns:
List of ColumnDefinition

getModel

public javax.swing.table.TableColumnModel getModel()
Retrun the table model

Returns:
TableColumnModel
